ComicInfo.Summary:
In the tradition of Moëbius and Corben, marvel at this jaw-dropping psychedelic masterpiece from Eisner nominee Matt Lesniewski (Mind MGMT Bootleg, Crimson Flower)!
On a quest for some questionable cosmetic surgery, our hero Faceless and his newfound Family have made their way to the bustling metropolis of Pinky Town (it’s not my fault that you’ve never heard of it!).
Faceless and friends quickly discover the perils of such a lively city, especially once Carp’s hazy past catches up to her and endangers the whole Family!
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-01-29 00:27:58. [Issue ID 1035571]
